channel.title: Ed Fast
channel.description: Recent news about Ed Fast, from openparliament.ca.

item.title: Mentioned by Optimist
item.description:
Container inspection facility to be built on Tsawwassen First Nation land - Delta
Tsawwassen First Nation Chief Bryce Williams (left), International Trade Minister Ed Fast, Port Metro Vancouver president Robin Silvester and MP Kerry-Lynne Findlay (right) announced Wednesday a container inspection facility will be constructed on TFN ...

item.title: Mentioned by MENAFN.COM
item.description:
Harper Government highlights ways the Asia-Pacific Gateway is helping ...
VANCOUVER, Jun 24, 2013, 2013 (Menafn - Canada NewsWire via COMTEX) --Wai Young, Member of Parliament for Vancouver South and Co-Chair of the Canada-China Legislative Association, on behalf of the Honourable Ed Fast, Minister of ... Over the next few days, MP Young will meet with key transportation and industry leaders on how the Asia-Pacific Gateway is building on Canada's competitive advantages, to further increase Canada's exports and investment ties throughout the Asia-Pacific region.
